name: LPMD_S_XML_MODE0_DAEMONIZED_STRESS
summary: Verify in default xml configuration, lpm mode 0, to enable HfiLpmEnable and HfiSuvEnable, with --no-daemon parameter to perform low power mode force enter, force exit, auto enter lpm, survivability mode enter, survivability mode exit and terminate in a stress cycles e.g. 100, then verify if all the activity patterns are correct from journal debug logs
